item.name: Home
item.description: So, the big thing on TikTok now are pesto eggs. Basically, you cook the eggs in the oil that’s contained in the pesto. I like TikTok trends, even though many foodbloggers look down their nose at them. I think it’s fun to try out a new “hacks”–kinda like my take on the feta cheese pasta […]
